SELECT LEVEL, C.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_COMMENT_NO, BOARD_COMMENT_CONTENT, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PROFILE, BOARD_PARENT_COMMENT_NO, BOARD_COMMENT_DEL_FL,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - BOARD_COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - BOARD_COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - BOARD_COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END BOARD_COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE,
FROM "BOARD_COMMENT" JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}) C WHERE BOARD_COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' OR 0 != (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_COMMENT" SUB WHERE SUB.BOARD_PARENT_COMMENT_NO = C.BOARD_COMMENT_NO AND BOARD_COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N') START WITH BOARD_PARENT_COMMENT_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR BOARD_COMMENT_NO = BOARD_PARENT_COMMENT_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY BOARD_COMMENT_NO
